title: Beyoncé's kids stole the show during 'Making The Gift' special
text:
In Beyoncé's ABC special "Making The Gift," viewers got a rare look at her full family including Blue Ivy, Rumi and Sir.

Interested in Beyonce? Add Beyonce as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Beyonce news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

Throughout the documentary, Beyoncé's creative process behind her album "The Lion King: The Gift" was shown and there were a few family-filled moments really brought everything together beautifully.

There are several adorable clips of her daughter Blue Ivy showing off her dance moves as well as her developing vocals.

There were also heartwarming moments that include the full Carter family enjoying quality time together.

While there have been a fair share of photos of Blue Ivy that have surfaced throughout the past few years, there are not as many of the younger twins, Rumi and Sir.

Fans were excited to see these special never-seen-before moments and hope for more soon.
